alert.note: Alert for Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 6:15AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF MODERATE TO BRIEFLY HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF POTTER AND TIOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 612 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Mansfield to 13 miles southwest of Wellsville and moving south at 5 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Mansfield, Elkland, Shinglehouse, Westfield, Genesee, Lawrenceville, Millerton, Keeneyville, Harrison Valley, Tioga, Knoxville, Ulysses, Roseville, Oswayo, Osceola, Tioga Junction, and Mansfield University. This includes the following highways... Route 15 from Mansfield to Lawrenceville. This line may approach Route 6 between 730 AM and 800 AM. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
